SEARCH
Package raytracer.math

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
raytracer.math.AbstractVec3
raytracer.math.Vector
public final class Vector extends AbstractVec3
Immutable 3D vector supporting common operations used by the raytracer: add, subtract, scale, component-wise multiplication, dot, cross, length and normalization. All methods return new Vector instances and do not mutate state.

  • Field Summary

    • add

      public Vector add(Vector v)
      Component-wise sum of this vector and v.
      Parameters:
      v - vector to add
      Returns:
      this + v

    • sub

      public Vector sub(Vector v)
      Component-wise difference of this vector and v.
      Parameters:
      v - vector to subtract
      Returns:
      this - v

    • scale

      public Vector scale(double d)
      Scales this vector by the scalar d.
      Parameters:
      d - scalar multiplier
      Returns:
      d * this

    • schur

      public Vector schur(Vector v)
      Component-wise (Hadamard/Schur) multiplication.
      Parameters:
      v - vector to multiply
      Returns:
      (this.x*v.x, this.y*v.y, this.z*v.z)

    • dot

      public double dot(Vector v)
      Dot product between this vector and v.
      Parameters:
      v - other vector
      Returns:
      this·v

    • cross

      public Vector cross(Vector v)
      Cross product (right-hand rule) between this vector and v.
      Parameters:
      v - other vector
      Returns:
      this × v, orthogonal to both

    • length

      public double length()
      Euclidean length (magnitude).
      Returns:
      sqrt(x^2 + y^2 + z^2)

    • normalized

      public Vector normalized()
      Unit-length vector in the same direction. Returns the zero vector if length == 0.
      Returns:
      normalized vector or (0,0,0) if zero-length

    • addTo

      public Point addTo(Point p)
      Translates the given point by this vector (p + v).
      Parameters:
      p - point to translate
      Returns:
      new point p + this

    • subtractFrom

      public Point subtractFrom(Point p)
      Translates the given point by -this vector (p - v).
      Parameters:
      p - point to translate
      Returns:
      new point p - this

      Returns:
